item.title: Spaceship 2
item.description: Virgin Galactic and Burt Rutan of Scaled Composites will be testing their new spacecraft this year. I'm still taking donations for the purchase of my seat into space. Enjoy the clip of what it might be like.
item.dc:creator: Brian Brainguy
item.itunes:summary: Virgin Galactic and Burt Rutan of Scaled Composites will be testing their new spacecraft this year. I'm still taking donations for the purchase of my seat into space. Enjoy the clip of what it might be like.

item.title: Podcast 5 - Speed Boost
item.description: March 2, 2007 A picture from the New Horizons spacecraft shows the Jupiter moon Io and the plumes from volcanoes on its surface. Hope you didn't miss the lunar eclipse, and stayed tuned for my interview with Lawerance Joseph about his book Apocalypse 2012.
item.dc:creator: Brian Brainguy
item.itunes:summary:
March 2, 2007

item.title: Haunted House 2007
item.description: Once again it's Halloween time here at Brain the Brainguy's Haunted Laboratory. Enjoy this clip of the fun.
item.dc:creator: Brian Brainguy
item.itunes:summary: Once again it's Halloween time here at Brain the Brainguy's Haunted Laboratory. Enjoy this clip of the fun.

item.title: Podcast 7 - Firsts In Space
item.description: Wally Schirra was the only astronaut to fly in all three of our first manned space programs. One of Americas great firsts. We need something great that we can do as a nation and be first at it. The first man on Mars would be great.
item.dc:creator: Brian Brainguy
item.itunes:summary: Wally Schirra was the only astronaut to fly in all three of our first manned space programs. One of Americas great firsts. We need something great that we can do as a nation and be first at it. The first man on Mars would be great.

item.title: Podcast 6 - Apocalypse 2012
item.description: Well here it is my entire interview with author Lawrence E. Joseph who wrote "Apocalypse 2012 - A Scientific Investigation Into Civilization's End." What an interesting guy Larry turned out to be, not a fanatic or a fraud just a normal guy who has discovered and put together common sense evidence about the potential end or beginning of life as we know it.
